answers.answer: Some swelling at the end is normal but you also have to keep an eye on it because it could be a sign of preeclampsia. Check your blood pressure if you can and if the swelling gets really bad and or you have headaches then go see your dr rigt away.

I had preeclampsia with my first kid and some swelling is normal, but if u have swelling with dizziness or just like a woozy feeling when u stand up u really need to call ur Dr. I literally saw "stars" even just sitting down. And it looked like u could poke my feet and arms with a pin and I'd pop. And my son had to be delivered a week later because of it.

question: Hi guys m 32 weeks 2 days pregnant n m having a lil. Swelling in my feet but for around 3 days so I wanted to know y Is it like that
title: swelling
